## PopulatableLiquity.borrowLUSD() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more LUSD.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borrowLUSD(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedLiquityTransaction<P, SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of LUSD to borrow. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[PopulatedLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.populatedliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrowLUSD: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)
```
